Description: Heavy traffic continuously with big trucks and road trains running between Perth and Kalgoorlie.  Few over taking opportunities causing frustration and people tend to take chances

Between northam and merredin there is currently only three overtaking lanes (160km stretch of road), on top of this, the road surface has seriously degraded in many places. Patchy roadworks are continually failing. Increased highway traffic means near misses happen frequently when people take their lives into their hands to try and pass slow traffic - this can also lead to people speeding to ensure their safe return to the left lane after passing traffic.
Very poor road that becomes really dangerous during harvest. Slow trucks running on gravel edges throwing up stones. Add to that, blind crests and sharp corners and you gave a really dangerous road.
Huge holes in roads. End up driving all over the road to miss the holes. This is very dangerous!
